summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ICAA website Phase 1 MVP. All core features are working excellently including homepage with ICAA branding, 4-tier membership system with Stripe integration, contact forms, newsletter subscription, admin dashboard, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Navigation links not visible by default on mobile (hidden behind hamburger menu)
design_issues.note: This is expected responsive design behavior

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (14/14 passed - 100% success rate)
Homepage loads with ICAA branding and red color scheme
Navigation between all pages (Home, Membership, Contact, News, Newsletter, Admin)
Membership page displays all 4 tiers correctly (Free $0, Monthly $10, Yearly $120, Lifetime $1200)
Paid membership Stripe checkout session creation
Mobile responsiveness with proper hamburger menu
All CRUD operations for news, contacts, members, newsletter subscribers
action_item_for_main_agent: No critical issues found. The ICAA website Phase 1 MVP is fully functional and ready for production. All requested features are working correctly including Stripe payment integration, membership tiers, content management, and mobile responsiveness.
